name: Internal Bomb Bay
description: The unit can use its internal cargo capacity as an internal bomb bay, releasing up to 6 bombs eahc turn. However, in the turn that ordnance is being dropped, there is  dange that ground fire will hit the exposed bay. On a roll of 10+, damage received from ground fire will strike the open bay and detonate all bombs remaining. The resulting damage is applied directly to the unit's SI.
